mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KoreaStocks (companyName, stockCode, sectors, mainProduck, stockedDay, settlementMonth, representativeName, website, location) + VALUES (#{companyName},#{stockCode},#{sectors},#{mainProduck},#{stockedDay},#{settlementMonth},#{representativeName},#{website},#{location})
mapper.update: UPDATE KoreaStocks SET companyName=#{src} WHERE companyName=#{target}
